metadata.title: CVE-2024-54502 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed inwatchOS 11.2, visionOS 2.2, tvOS 18.2, macOS Sequoia 15.2, Safari 18.2, iOS18.2 and iPadOS 18.2. Processing maliciously crafted web content may leadto an unexpected process crash.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
wpewebkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
